title: Getting To School: A Histogram
question_text:
Billy surveyed $27$ of his friends and asked how long it took for them to get to school each morning. Results of his survey are shown in the histogram below.
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved.
What percent of those surveyed said they were able to get to school in under $10$ minutes?

choices.text: The percent cannot be determined from the histogram.
